statements: SELECT * FROM driver_performance;
SELECT driver_name, driving_score FROM driver_performance WHERE driving_score > 80;
SELECT driver_name, safety_rating FROM driver_performance ORDER BY safety_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM driver_performance WHERE driving_score < 70 OR safety_rating < 4.5;
SELECT AVG(driving_score) AS average_score FROM driver_performance;
SELECT * FROM driver_performance WHERE driving_score > 80 ORDER BY driver_name ASC
SELECT driver_name, driving_score FROM driver_performance WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT AVG(driving_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(driver_id) AS total_drivers FROM driver_performance GROUP BY safety_rating HAVING COUNT(driver_id) > 5
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, driving_score, safety_rating FROM driver_performance ORDER BY safety_rating DESC, driving_score ASC
SELECT driver_name, driving_score FROM driver_performance WHERE driving_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90
SELECT * FROM driver_performance;
SELECT driver_id, total_trips FROM driver_performance WHERE total_miles > 10000;
SELECT driver_id, total_accidents FROM driver_performance ORDER BY total_accidents DESC;
SELECT * FROM driver_performance WHERE total_trips >= 500 AND total_miles <= 20000;
SELECT driver_id, total_trips, total_miles, total_accidents FROM driver_performance WHERE driver_id = 5;

SELECT d.driver_id, d.total_trips, s.seatbelt_usage FROM driver_performance d JOIN safety_metrics s ON d.driver_id = s.driver_id WHERE d.total_accidents > 0 AND s.speed_limit_violations > 5 ORDER BY d.total_trips DESC
SELECT d.driver_id, d.total_miles, s.alcohol_test FROM driver_performance d JOIN safety_metrics s ON d.driver_id = s.driver_id WHERE d.total_miles BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY d.driver_id ASC
SELECT d.driver_id, d.total_accidents, s.speed_limit_violations, s.alcohol_test FROM driver_performance d JOIN safety_metrics s ON d.driver_id = s.driver_id WHERE d.driver_id = 3

SELECT d.total_miles, d.total_accidents, s.speed_limit_violations FROM driver_performance d JOIN safety_metrics s ON d.driver_id = s.driver_id WHERE s.seatbelt_usage = true ORDER BY d.total_accidents DESC, s.speed_limit_violations ASC
SELECT d.total_miles, s.speed_limit_violations, s.alcohol_test FROM driver_performance d JOIN safety_metrics s ON d.driver_id = s.driver_id WHERE d.total_trips < 50 ORDER BY d.total_miles DESC
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT name, license_number FROM drivers WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT model, year FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT driver_id, speed, distance_traveled FROM metrics WHERE speed > 100;
SELECT name, plate_number, safety_rating FROM drivers INNER JOIN vehicles ON drivers.id = vehicles.id;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT name, license_number FROM drivers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT plate_number, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT name, model, speed FROM drivers d JOIN vehicles v ON d.id = v.id JOIN metrics m ON d.id = m.driver_id WHERE speed > 100;
SELECT name, distance_traveled, safety_rating FROM drivers d JOIN metrics m ON d.id = m.driver_id WHERE distance_traveled > 1000;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT name, employee_id FROM drivers WHERE employee_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT model, brand, year FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT trip_date, distance_km, duration_minutes FROM trips WHERE duration_minutes > 60;
SELECT driver_id, vehicle_id, date_time, description FROM incidents WHERE driver_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT name, license_number FROM drivers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT model, year, brand FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year ASC, brand;
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE trip_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND distance_km > 100 ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT driver_id, vehicle_id, date_time FROM incidents WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date_time) = 2022 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM drivers WHERE fleet_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_type, plate_number FROM vehicles WHERE driver_id = 3;
SELECT start_location, end_location, trip_date FROM trips ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT fleet_name, fleet_manager FROM fleets WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC, driver_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT driver_name, license_number, fleet_id FROM drivers WHERE driver_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT trips.trip_id, trips.start_location, trips.end_location, vehicles.plate_number FROM trips INNER JOIN vehicles ON trips.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE trips.distance_km > 100 ORDER BY trips.trip_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT driver_name, fleet_name, location FROM drivers INNER JOIN fleets ON drivers.fleet_id = fleets.fleet_id WHERE drivers.driver_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY drivers.driver_name ASC;

SELECT drivers.driver_name, COUNT(safety_records.record_id) AS num_incidents FROM drivers LEFT JOIN safety_records ON drivers.driver_id = safety_records.driver_id GROUP BY drivers.driver_name HAVING num_incidents > 0 ORDER BY num_incidents DESC LIMIT 3;
